name: part_002
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・昼公演】ときのそら5th Anniversary Live『宇宙と時空のミルキーウェイ』【 #ときのそらMW 】 [KbSdP7GAOG0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Pre-show information and flower stand acknowledgments.
Opening prologue animation featuring a picture book and a girl walking through space.
Title card for Tokino Sora 5th Anniversary Live 'Universe and Spacetime Milky Way'.
Concert performance begins with the song 'Chu-Chu-Lu' followed by a short MC.

subtitles.original:
注意事項
録音・録画・撮影の禁止
SNS等へのアップロードの禁止
subtitles.english:
Precautions
Recording, filming, and photography are prohibited.
Uploading to SNS and other platforms is prohibited.

subtitles.original: Thank you for Flower stands!
subtitles.english: Thank you for Flower stands!

subtitles.original: ここに一冊の絵本があります
subtitles.english: Here is a single picture book.

subtitles.original: とても古い絵本です
subtitles.english: It is a very old picture book.

subtitles.original: その本が描かれたのは
subtitles.english: That book was written...

subtitles.original: この星からずっとずっと離れた 銀河をゆく船の中
subtitles.english: ...long, long ago on a ship traveling through the galaxy far away from this planet.

subtitles.original: 永い時をかけて 星から星へと旅する船です
subtitles.english: It is a ship that has traveled from star to star over a long period of time.

subtitles.original: この本は 船に暮らす子供たちのために描かれました
subtitles.english: This book was written for the children living on the ship.

subtitles.original: くら～い ばしょを 女の子が歩いてる
subtitles.english: A girl is walking through a dark place.

subtitles.original: 目の前には どこまでも続く白い道
subtitles.english: Before her eyes is a white path that stretches on forever.

subtitles.original: いつから歩いているか わからないけど 元気に歩く
subtitles.english: She doesn't know how long she's been walking, but she walks energetically.

subtitles.original: 「この道は光っていてきれいだな」
subtitles.english: "This path is shining and beautiful."

subtitles.original: 「それにとっても歩きやすい！」
subtitles.english: "And it's so easy to walk on!"

subtitles.original: 女の子は歩くのが好きみたい
subtitles.english: It seems the girl likes walking.

subtitles.original: 元気よく てくてく歩いていく
subtitles.english: She walks along cheerfully, step by step.

subtitles.original: 「あっ 流れ星！」
subtitles.english: "Oh, a shooting star!"

subtitles.original: 「わあ きれいなお星さま！」
subtitles.english: "Wow, what a beautiful star!"

subtitles.original: 「熱くはないみたい さわってみよう」
subtitles.english: "It doesn't seem hot. Let's try touching it."

subtitles.original: 「光っていてすきとおってるわ」
subtitles.english: "It's shining and transparent."

subtitles.original: 「お星さまものぞいてみよう！」
subtitles.english: "Let's take a look inside the star too!"

subtitles.original: 「わあ みたことない世界！」
subtitles.english: "Wow, a world I've never seen before!"

subtitles.original: 女の子は降ってくる星を通して 色々な世界を覗きます
subtitles.english: Through the falling stars, the girl peeks into various worlds.

subtitles.original: この絵本はとても古いものです
subtitles.english: This picture book is very old.

subtitles.original: なので 最後のページがなくなってしまっています
subtitles.english: So, the last page is missing.

subtitles.original: 船の中にいる大人も子供も考えました
subtitles.english: The adults and children on the ship thought about it.

subtitles.original: 結末がわからないのは残念だけど
subtitles.english: It's a shame we don't know the ending...

subtitles.original: 続きのお話を考えるのは 少し楽しいことでした
subtitles.english: ...but it was a little fun to think of the rest of the story.

subtitles.original: この本のタイトルは……
subtitles.english: The title of this book is...

subtitles.original:
ときのそら 5th Anniversary Live
宇宙と時空のミルキーウェイ
subtitles.english:
Tokino Sora 5th Anniversary Live
Universe and Spacetime Milky Way

subtitles.original: ココココイスル 私 輝く
subtitles.english: Falling in-in-in-in-love, I am shining,

subtitles.original: ほら キラキラキラ煌めいてる
subtitles.english: Look, I'm sparkling, sparkling, sparkling.

subtitles.original: トトト 太陽みたいに笑う
subtitles.english: Laughing like the su-su-su-sun,

subtitles.original: 私の 目まぐるしい
subtitles.english: My dizzying...

subtitles.original: ラブストーリー！
subtitles.english: ...love story!

subtitles.original: 皆、お待たせ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, sorry for the wait!

subtitles.original: ときのそらです！
subtitles.english: It's Tokino Sora!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がってくよ！
subtitles.english: Let's get excited!

subtitles.original: あーもう やっんなっちゃうわ
subtitles.english: Ah, enough already, I'm fed up!

subtitles.original: 今度ばかりは許せないの
subtitles.english: This time, I just can't forgive you.

subtitles.original: その悪気な...
subtitles.english: That malicious...
